description.en:
Another enhanced music mod

this mod adds new music to the game during battle and in different screens
The mod will work with any other music mod that I made
currently there is enough space left for one 3-4 minute track and if anyone
has any battle focused ones i'm all ears a

this mod adds new songs in:
3 strategic
2 combat
3 ship builder
2 city view 
and a extra menu music for good mesure
